boulder
  • Reference

Reference version 0.1.0

All functions

eliminate

Check vars that can be eliminated

extract_icd

Extract ICD10 string. Extracts ICD10 string and expands range when range of codes is shown.

get_all_tables

List available data tables

get_databases

List of available databases at TAI, wrapper around tai_api

get_nodes

Get database nodes

get_tables

Get database node ids or table metadata

icd_intersect

Evaluates whether intersect between two vectors with ICD10 codes is longer than zero.

icd_sums

Tries to identify nested ICD10 codes.

json_to_df

Convert json to data_frame. Extract data from json file downloaded from Estonian Health Statistics and Health Research database

map_get_tables

Map get_tables function

print

Print TAI API object

pull_table

Download data table from TAI

query_fun

Run api query

recode_vars

Recode downloaded variables

tai_api

Interact with TAI API.

unescape_html

Fix html character encoding

unwrap_content

Extract table from downloaded content.
